0.Pros: Goodbye and goodnight all the time

1.Pros: crew meal, decent pay, fast paced
1.Cons: poor management, hostile conditions, lack of good motivation and high employee turnover rates

2.Summary: "I miss my coworkers but not my job."
2.Pros: It's very easy to advance to a shift manager from a crew member.
2.Cons: Not a lot of opportunities for advancement after shift manager. I was constantly harassed to stay past my shift and told on more than one occasion I had to or I'd be fired. Raises and reviews weren't frequent enough. Large turnover rate with crew members. I was expected to go to the bank off the clock after my shift to drop off a deposit everyday when it was totally the opposite direction from where I lived and it took 20 mins just to get there! Unacceptable

3.Pros: Great stability in a job, you will find no better reliability in an income. Scheduling goes to those who work the hardest.
3.Cons: You will not move up unless you are personal friends with the general manager. They run the position decisions like it is a high school popularity contest.

4.Pros: McDonald's has a good business model for profit.
4.Cons: Staffing, no one stays because the stress is hard for most.

5.Pros: You can meet new people and you can find out the difference in people's taste buds.
5.Cons: You stand on your feet alot and you get alot of crap talking from people

6.Pros: The managers are very friendly and care about the crew not only as employees but also as people.
6.Cons: Sometimes they will move people around without regard to what some people enjoy. For example person A and B are equally good at the grill but person A hates grill and person B loves it. Both are also equally good at everything else but management decides to send person A to grill.

7.Pros: Great pay, great people, great benifits
7.Cons: Depends on your Point of veiw

8.Pros: It's a friendly environment to work in

9.Summary: "cashier , greeted the customers as they walked in , cleaned the lobby , and presented"
9.Pros: the pros about working at McDonalds is that when you are there at work theres never a dull moment. everyone is nice and very helpful.
9.Cons: the cons about working at McDonalds is that the management will take advantage of there power especially the younger managers.
